Meanings: One of Archie's classifications for different types of carbonate rocks for visible porosity under 10x microscope some visible porosity with the size between 2mm
یکی از مقیاس‌های طبقه بندی آرچی که مشخص کننده سنگی است که تحت بزرگنمایی 10 میکروسکپ تخلخلی با اندازه بین دو میلیمتر تا 50 میکرون مشاهده می‌گردد
coarse, also mostly write as : crs
ولی بیشتر مواقع بصورت «crs» نوشته می‌شود
سلر حفره ای مکعبی شکل است که در زیر سکوی حفاری ساخته می‌شود و پیت نیز استخری است که برای مواد زاید گل حفاری حفر می‌گردد
circulate to clean hole, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in reports
گردش گل بمنظور تمیز نمودن چاه
circulate to condition mud, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in reports
گردش گل به منظور بهینه سازی گل حفاری
circulate pill, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in reports
circulate for sample, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in reports
گردش گل به منظور بسطح آمدن نمونه‌های حفاری شده
change tools, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
The equipment necessary for cable tool drilling of a well. A heavy metal bar, sharpened to a chisel

like point on the lower end is attached to a drilling rope or wire line cable which is fastened to a walking beam above the rig floor that provides an up and down motion to the line and the metal drilling tools. The drilling tool, called a bit, comes in a variety of cutting
A drilling method in which the hole is drilled by dropping a sharply pointed bit on bottom. The bit is attached to a cable, and the cable is repeatedly dropped as the hole is drilled
نمودار گیری جهت اندازه گیری قطر چاه در فواصل مختلف
COMPUTED GAMMA/CALIPER/SECTION GAUGE, Log Curve name
که در آن میزان آهک بین 10 تا 30 درصد است
absorbing chemical compound, or desiccant used to accelerate setting times in cement and as a drying agent
The active ingredient of slaked hydrated Lime, and the main constituent in Cement when wet . Referred to as "Lime" in field terminology
A freshwater drilling mud using calcium oxide lime or calcium sulfate gypsum to retard the hydrating qualities of shale and clay formation, thus facilitating drilling. Calcium
treated muds resist scale and any anhydrite contamination but may require further treatment to prevent gelation solidifcation under the high temperatures of deep wells
نمودار گیری جهت اندازه گیری قطر چاه در فواصل مختلف
An instrument with two legs or jaws that can be adjusted for measuring linear dimensions, thicknesses, or diameters

A record showing variations in Wellbore diameter by depth, indicating undue enlargement due to caving in, washing, or other causes. The Caliper Log also reveals corrosion, scaling, or pitting inside tubular goods
Generically, a pressure gauge usually used in lines or manifolds. Many companies make pressure gauges. Cameron, now Cooper Oil Tools, makes many types of gauges
Out by placing a very strong valve on the Wellhead. See also : Blowout
like plate of Anhydrite, Gypsum, Limestone, or Sulfur overlying most Salt domes in the Gulf Coast region
. impermeable rock overlying an Oil or Gas reservoir that tends to prevent migration of Oil or Gas out of the reservoir
Casing run, Operation's Abbreviations use in writing drilling reports
راندن کیسینگ یا لوله‌های جداره ای
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
A Wellbore in which Casing has been run

Steel pipe placed in an oil or gas well as drilling progresses to prevent the wall of the hole from caving in during drilling, to prevent seepage of fluids, and to provide a means of extracting petroleum if the well is productive
A device secured around the casing at the regular intervals to center it in the hole. Casing that is centralized allows a more uniform cement sheath to form around the pipe
CCL, A Log which indicate the collar of the Casing
لاگی است که بمنظور تعیین محل یقه کیسینگ رانده می‌شود
A tubular section of pipe that is threaded inside and used to connect two joints of casing
A perforating gun run in on the casing string
A circular device with a frictional gripping arrangement of slips and packing rings used to suspend casing from a casinghead in a well

A means of cementing casing in a well so that the casing may, if necessary, be retrieved with minimum difficulty. A special mud, usually an oil mud, is placed in the well ahead of the cement after the casing has been set. Non

solidifying mud is used so that it does not bind or stick to the casing in the hole in the area above the cement. Since the mud does not gel for a long time, the casing can be cut above the cemented section and retrieved. Casing packs are used in wells of doubtful or limited production to permit reuse of valuable lengths of casing
فشار لوله‌های جداره ای در هنگامی که چاه بسته است
The table shape tools which use to put Casing pipes on
A tool composed of a mandrel on which are mounted several heavy

duty rollers with eccentric roll surfaces. It is used to restore buckled, collapsed, or dented casing in a well to normal diameter and roundness. Made up on tubing or drill pipe and run into the well to the depth of the deformed casing, the tool is rotated slowly, allowing the rollers to contact all sides of the casing and restore it to roughly its original condition
CAS, Operations' abbreviations use in writing drilling reports
عملیات راندن کیسینگ یا لوله‌های جداره ای
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Blade tool used to scrape away junk or debris from inside casing; run on pipe or tubing

A procedure whereby the formation immediately below the casing shoe is subjected to a pressure equal to the pressure expected to be exerted later by a higher drilling glut density or by the sum of a higher drilling fluid density and back
The location of the bottom of a string of casing
that is cemented in a well. Typically, a casing
Shoe is made up on the end of the casing at this point
مجموعه لوله‌های جداری یا کیسینگ که در داخل چاه رانده می‌شود
Large wrench used for turning when making up or breaking out casing

A heavy, flanged steel fitting connected to the first string of casing. It provides a housing for slips and packing assemblies, allows suspension of intermediate and production strings of casing, and supplies the means for the annulus to be sealed off. also called a Spool

A special tool with a Rubber Packer or lead seal that is used to repair Casing. When Casing is damaged downhole, a cut is made below the damaged Casing, the damaged Casing and the Casing above it are pulled from the Well, and the damaged Casing is removed from the Casing String. The tool is made up and lowered into the Well on the Casing until it engages the top of the Casing that remains in the Well, and a Rubber Packer or lead seal in the tool forms a seal with the Casing that is in the Well. The Casing
like device and is sometimes called a Casing Overshot

Time actually spent for all the operations necessary to enable any test include pressure test. DST, . . . preformed inside casing from the Rig Up equipment for well test to Rig Down. This includes Tripping for perforations, setting Packers and etc, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
یک کابل کشنده یا بلند کننده
محور گردانی که دو طرف گردونه را قطع می‌کند
To obtain cuttings for Geological information as Formations are penetrated by the Bit. The samples are obtained from drilling fluid as it emerges from the wellbore or, in cable
tool drilling, from the bailer. Cuttings are carefully washed until they are free of foreign matter, dried, and labeled to indicate the depth at which they were obtained
A device fitted into a junk basket and acting as a trap door to retain the junk
shaped Hub on a winch shaft around which a rope is wound for pulling and hoisting, a power take
off Spool used by the Driller as he operates the cat line
shaped attachment on a winch around which rope is wound for hoisting and pulling
قرقره مانندی است که بر سر شفتی که از کنار گردونه حفاری خارج شده سوار می‌شود
A hoisting or pulling line operated from a cathead
The ramp at the side of the drilling rig where pipe is laid to be lifted to the derrick floor by the catline or by an air hoist
Sodium Hydroxide. Used to maintain an alkaline pH in drilling mud and in petroleum fractions
The collapse of the walls of the wellbore
A rock formation that contains large open spaces, usually resulting from the dissolving of soluble substances by formation waters that may still be present
Collapsing of the walls of the Wellbore
COMPENSATED ACOUSTIC VELOCITY, Log Curve name
CEMENT BOND EVALUATION TOOL, Log Curve name
Cement Bond Log, A Log which indicate the location of the Cement behind Casing or Liner
لاگی که بمنظور تعیین محل سیمان موجود در پشت لوله‌های جداره ای رانده می‌شود
ACOUSTIC CEMENT BOND/CEMENT BOND/SONIC BOND, Log Curve name
گردش گل برای به سطح آوردن آخرین نمونه‌های حفاری شده در ته چاه
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد

cut casing, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in their daily reports

Casing Collar Locator, A Log which indicate the collar of the Casing
لاگی که بمنظور تعیین محل یقه کیسینگ رانده می‌شود
عمقی که در قرار داد ذکر شده و چاه بایستی تا آن عمق حفاری شود
CONTINUOUS DIPMETER DIGITAL, Log Curve name
COMPENSATED DENSITY LOG, Log Curve name
CONTINUOUS DIPMETER/DIPLOG/RESISTIVITY DIP, Log Curve name
CONTINUOUS DIRECTIONAL SURVEY, Log Curve name
cement casing, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in their daily reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
A hole dug, usually before drilling of a well, to allow working space for the casinghead equipment
سلر حفره ای مکعبی شکل است که در زیر سکوی حفاری ساخته می‌شود و پیت نیز استخری است که برای مواد زاید گل حفاری می‌سازند
cementing run, Operation's Abbreviations which Companymans use in their daily reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
A powder, consisting of alumina, silica, lime, and other substances that hardens when mixed with water. Extensively used in the oil industry to bond casing to the walls of the wellbore
لاگی که بمنظور تعیین محل سیمان موجود در پشت لوله‌های جداره ای رانده می‌شود

An acoustic survey or Sonic Logging method that records the quality or hardness of the cement used in the annulus to bond the casing and the formation. Casing that is well bonded to the formation transmits an acoustic signal quickly; poorly bonded casing transmits a signal slowly
CEC, Actions or jobs which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
عملیات سیمان نمودن پشت لوله‌های جداره ای
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
ارزیابی سیمان موجود در پشت لوله‌های جداره ای
CEP, Actions or jobs which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
A portion of cement placed at some point in the wellbore to seal it
Cement pulsation entails the use of specialized surface equipment to apply low

intensity pressure pulses to the annulus immediately following the cement pumping operation. The pulses serve to break the gel strength of the cement during the cement setting process. Gel strength development causes a reduction of the hydrostatic pressure transmitted through the annulus. By breaking the gel strength, hydrostatic pressure is maintained on the column until the cement has built sufficient strength to prevent the potential influx of reservoir fluids through the cement matrix
A tool set temporarily in the casing or well to prevent the passage of cement, thereby forcing it to follow another designated path. It is used in squeeze cementing and other remedial cementing jobs
An accessory attached to the top of the casing to facilitate cementing of the casing. It has passages for cement slurry and retain chambers for cementing wiper plugs

A slurry of portland cement and water and sometimes one or more additives that affect either the density of the mixture or its setting time. The portland cement used may be high early strength common standard , or slow setting. Additives include accelerators such as calcium chloride , retarders such as gypsum , weighting materials such as barium sulfate , lightweight additives such as bentonite , or a variety of lost circulation materials, such as mica flakes
CEM, Operations' abbreviations use in their daily drilling reports
عملیات بمنظور تزریق سیمان در اطراف لوله‌های جداره ای
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
hundredth of a Poise; a measure of a fluid's viscosity, or resistance to flow

اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد

گازی که در هنگام اضافه نمودن لوله‌های حفاری به رشته حفاری خارج می‌گردد

COMPENSATED GAMMA RAY NEUTRON, Log Curve name

Chain wrench, or In general, Chain Tongs are used for turning pipe or fittings of a diameter larger than that which a pipe wrench would fit. The chain is looped and tightened around the pipe or fitting, and the handle is used to turn the tool so that the pipe or fitting can be tightened or loosened
II, Archie classification for Carbonate rocks, a rock which is generally soft and chalky
A small building, or Doghouse, in which members of a drilling rig or roustabout crew change clothes, store personal belongs, and so on
CRA, Actions or jobs which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports, To take Rams out of a Blow

Out Preventer and replace them with Rams of a different size or type. When the size of a Drill Pipe is changed, the size of the Pipe Rams must be changed to ensure that they seal around the Pipe when closed, unless variable
bore pipe Rams are in use
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
C/T, Actions or jobs which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
A sample of cuttings which usually get, to check lithology between regular samples
ارزیابی نمونه‌های حفاری بتوسط گرفتن نمونه اضافی از روی شیکر و به جهت چک نمودن لیتولوژی در فاصله بین نمونه‌های منظم
A valve that permits flow in one direction only. if the gas or liquid starts to reverse, the valve automatically closes, preventing reverse movement. Commonly referred to as a one
grained Quartz, a Silica mineral with minor impurities

Flint is gray to black and nearly opaque translucent brown in thin splinters . Opaque, dull, whitish to pale brown or gray samples are called simply Chert. Chert and Flint provided the main source of tools and weapons for Stone Age people. Flint is used today as an abrasive agent on Sandpapers and in Mills that grind raw materials for the Ceramic and Paint industries. Considerable amounts of Chert are also used in road construction and as concrete aggregate. Some Chert takes an excellent polish and is used as semiprecious Jewelry. See also siliceous rock
Pipe Tongs that grip the pipe with a chisel
like insert in the jaw of the wrench
گاهی این اختصار برای گچ نیز بکار می‌رود
آهک چاکی یا آهکی که حالت نرم داشته و اغلب با مارن اشتباه گرفته می‌شود
chk, also sometimes use : ch, A device inserted in a flow line to regulate the rate of flow
Out Preventer assembly used to direct control the flow of well fluids from the annulus to the choke
The arrangement of Piping and Chokes through which Drilling Mud is circulated when the Blow

out Preventers are closed to control the pressures encountered during a Kick, or an arrangement of piping and special valves, called Chokes. In drilling, Mud is circulated through a Choke Manifold when the Blow
Out Preventers are closed. In well testing, a Choke Manifold attached to the Wellhead allows flow and pressure control for test components downstream
چند راهه کاهنده فشار یا چوک منیفولد

An assembly of Valves mounted on the Casinghead through which a Well is produced. The Christmas Tree also contains Valves for testing the Well and for Shutting it In, if necessary. Christmas Tree, the Control Valves, Pressure Gauges, and Chokes assembled at the top of a Well to control the flow of Oil and Gas after the Well has been drilled and completed, or The control Valves, Pressure Gauges, and Chokes assembled at the top of a Well to control the flow of Oil and Gas after the Well has been drilled and completed
فشار سنج‌ها و مجموعه‌های کاهنده سر چاه که پس از پایان حفاری جهت کنترل جریان نفت و گاز استفاده می‌گردند
CASING INSPECTION/ELECTRO MAGNETIC DETECTOR, Log Curve name
Time actually spent for circulating while running Casing, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
circulation, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Time actually spent for circulating and pumping mud while not drilling, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد

CIR, just circulate, Actions or jobs which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports, or To pass from one point throughout a system and back to the starting point. For example : Drilling Fluid is circulated out of the Suction Pit, down the Drill Pipe and Drill Collars, out the Bit, up the Annulus, and back to the Pits while drilling proceeds
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد

گردش پیل حفاری جهت کنترل هرز روی

گردش گل حفاری جهت تمیز نمودن چاه
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد

گردش گل بمنظور بهینه سازی وضعیت گل

Volume Flow Rate of circulating drilling fluid expressed in gallons or barrels per minute
گاهی به اندازه دانه‌ها نیز اطلاق می‌گردد

Rock or Sediment composed of particles, which have been transported from their place of origin, as Sandstone and Shale. A Sedimentary rock such as Shale, Siltstone, Sandstone or Conglomerate or sediment such as : Mud, Silt, Sand, or Pebbles . An accumulation of transported weathering debris
Clay size, particles smaller than 0.004 mm, or 4 μ
گاهی به اندازه دانه‌ها نیز اطلاق می‌گردد
Cl, also sometimes write as : Cly
usually organic compounds of high molecular weight
that, when added in low concentrations to a bentonite or to certain other clay slurries, will increase the viscosity of the system
Clst, also write sometimes as : Clyst
تمیز کردن از طریق گردش گل حفاری و خارج نمودن مواد از چاه به بیرون
A well capable of producing oil or gas, but temporarily shut in
The assembly of pumps, valves, lines, accumulators, and other items necessary to open and close the blowout preventer equipment
color or in American language write as : colour

Rock or Sediment composed of particles, which have been transported from their place of origin, as Sandstone and Shale. A Sedimentary rock such as Shale, Siltstone, Sandstone or Conglomerate or sediment such as : Mud, Silt, Sand, or Pebbles . An accumulation of transported weathering debris
A computer program, to be used in conjunction with the dipmeter
یک نرم افزار کامپیوتری که در ارتباط با شیب سنج مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد

cementing of casing, Liner tieback from rig up to Rig Down cement head including all line tests, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
Lost time due to cementing, or bad cement job, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
COMPENSATED NEUTRON DENSITY, Log Curve name

A type of Sedimentary rock compounded of Pebbles and rock fragments of various sizes held together by a cementing material, the same type material that holds Sandstone together. Conglomerates are a common form of reservoir rocks
کنگلومرا: که قطعات بزرگتر از 2 میلیمتر داشته و اکثر آنها گرد می‌باشند

COMPENSATED NEUTRON POROSITY, Log Curve name
conditioning run, Operation's Abbreviations Companymans use in their daily drilling reports
راندن لوله‌های حفاری در چاه بمنظور بهینه سازی وضعیت آن
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد

گردش گل حفاری به منظور خارج نمودن آن از سیستم حفاری
crs, also use as : c or cr
Sand particles with size between 0.5 mm

A workover performed with a continuous steel tube, normally 3/4 inch to 1 inch outside diameter, which is run into the well in one piece inside the normal tubing. Lengths of the tubing up to 16,000 feet are stored on the surface on a reel in a manner similar to that used for wireline. The unit is rigged up over the wellhead. The tubing is injected through a control head that seals off the tubing and makes a pressure
tight connection. A unique feature of the unit is that it allows continuous circulation while it is being lowered into the hole
A coupling for two lengths of Pipe, a Pipe fitting with threads on the inside for joining two pieces of threaded Pipes of the same size
A pipe coupling threaded on the inside

A logging device used to determine accurately the depth of a well; the log measures and records the depth of each casing collar, or coupling, in a well. Since the length of each joint of casing is written down, along with the number of joints of casing that were put into the well, knowing the number and depth of the collars allows an accurate measure of well depth
like device used to lock or position certain tool components by manipulating the tubing string or downhole tool
Pertaining to a Colloid, i.e., involving particles so minute less than 2 μ that they are not visible through optical microscopes. Bentonite is an example of a colloidal Clay
completion job, Operation's Abbreviations Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
عملیات یا جاب تکمیل سازی چاه
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد

To pull the drill stem out of the wellbore to change the bit, to change from a core barrel to the bit, to run electric logs, to prepare for a drill stem test, to run casing, and so on. also called trip out

All operation necessary to run the completion : from the end of operation on production Casing with Bit /Scraper on bottom, to starting of the well testing or rig down, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
Cmpt, also write sometimes as : cpct
cpctt, also write sometimes as : Cmpt
I, Archie Classification for Carbonate rocks , a rock which is dense with angular corners
I, Archie classification for Carbonate rocks, a rock which is dense with angular corners
نماینده شرکت نفت یا ناظر فنی سر چاه
an employee of an operating company whose job is to represent the company's interests at the drilling location
ناظر فنی حفاری حاضر در محل دکل حفاری که معمولا کلیە مسیولیت‌های ادارە دکل حفاری با اوست
نماینده شرکت نفت یا ناظر فنی سر چاه
The ability of to withstand applied pressure. Also called : Formation Integrity
Refers to the installation of permanent equipment for the production of oil or gas
solids fluid or drilling mud used when a well is being completed. it is selected not only for its ability to control formation pressure, but also for the properties that minimize formation damage
COM, Operations' abbreviations Companymans generally write in their daily drilling reports
جاب یا عملیات تکمیل چاه پس از اتمام عملیات حفاری
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
The ratio of the actual volume of gas at a given temperature and pressure to the volume of gas when calculated by the ideal gas law
A system whereby the end devices in the field switches, valves, gauges, alarms, etc. are controlled by a program placed in the computer
A rigid offshore drilling platform built of steel

reinforced concrete and used to drill development wells. The platform is floated to the drilling site in a vertical position, and at the site tall caissons that serve as the foundation of the platform are flooded so that the platform submerges and comes to rest on bottom. Because of the enormous weight of the platform, the force of gravity alone keeps it in place
A method for killing well pressure in which circulation is commenced immediately and mud weight is brought up in steps, or increments, usually a point at a time. Also called circulate
weight method, see also : concurrent method
A method for killing well pressure in which circulation is commenced immediately and mud weight is brought up in steps, or increments, usually a point at a time. Also called circulate

This can refer to any mixture of relatively light Hydrocarbons which remain liquid at normal temperature and pressure. There will be some Propane and Butane dissolved in it. Unlike Crude Oil, there is little or none of the heavy Hydrocarbons which constitute heavy Fuel Oil. There are three main sources of condensate: a The liquid Hydrocarbons which are separated out when raw Gas is treated. This condensate typically consists of C5 to C8. b The liquid Hydrocarbons which are recovered at the surface from non
associated Gas. c The liquid Hydrocarbons which are produced from Gas/condensate Reservoir. This may be only slightly distinguishable from a light stabilised Crude Oil

This can refer to any mixture of relatively light Hydrocarbons which remain liquid at normal temperature and pressure. There will be some Propane and Butane dissolved in it. Unlike Crude Oil, there is little or none of the heavy Hydrocarbons which constitute heavy Fuel Oil. There are three main sources of condensate: a The liquid Hydrocarbons which are separated out when raw Gas is treated. This condensate typically consists of C5 to C8. b The liquid Hydrocarbons which are recovered at the surface from non
associated Gas. c The liquid Hydrocarbons which are produced from Gas/condensate Reservoir. This may be only slightly distinguishable from a light stabilised Crude Oil
Hydrocarbons which are in the gaseous state under reservoir conditions but which become liquid either in passage up the hole or at the surface
CNR, Operations' abbreviations Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
عملیاتی جهت بهینه سازی وضعیت چاه
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد

An Electrical Logging measurement obtained from an Induction Survey, in which eddy currents produced by an alternating magnetic field induce in a receiver coil a voltage proportionate to the ability of the formation to conduct electricity

Generally, the first string of casing in a well. It may be lowered into a hole drilled into the formations near the surface and cemented in place; or it may be driven into the ground by a special pile drive in such cases, it is sometimes called drive pipe ; or it may be jetted into place in offshore locations. Its purpose is to prevent the soft formations near the surface from caving in and to conduct drilling mud from the bottom of the hole to the surface when drilling starts. Also called : conductor pipe
diameter conductive line used in electric wireline operations, such as electric well logging and perforating, in which the transmission of electrical current is required. Compare wireline

In Petrology, lithified Sedimentary rocks consisting of rounded fragments larger than 0.08 inch, 2 mm in diameter. It is commonly contrasted with Breccia. Conglomerates are usually subdivided according to the average size of their constituent materials into Pebble fine , Cobble medium , and Boulder or coarse
سنگی با قطعات درشت بزرگتر از 2 میلیمتر و گرد شده
یک نوع سنگ رسوبی که از ذرات درشت در اندازه گراول ترکیب یافته است. کنگلومراهای معروف ایران شامل: کنگلومرای بختیاری و کرمان و هزار دره می‌باشند
A type of sedimentary rock compounded of pebbles and rock fragments of various sizes held together by a cementing material, the same type
material that holds sandstone together. Conglomerates are a common form of reservoir rock
In petrology, lithified sedimentary rock consisting of rounded fragments larger than

in. 2 mm in diameter. It is commonly contrasted with breccia. Conglomerates are usually subdivided according to the average size of their constituent materials into pebble fine , cobble medium , and boulder coarse
Water inherent to the producing formation; or fossil sea water trapped in the pore spaces of sediments during their deposition

CG, The relatively small amount of Gas that enters a Well when the Mud Pump is stopped for a connection to be made. Since bottomhole pressure decreases when the pump is stopped, Gas may enter the Well
گازی که در هنگام اضافه نمودن لوله‌های حفاری به رشته حفاری خارج می‌گردد

A method of killing a well that has kicked, in which the choke size is adjusted to maintain a constant casing pressure. This method does not work unless the kick is all or nearly all salt water. if the kick is gas, this method will not maintain a constant bottomhole pressure, because gas expands as it rises in the annulus. In any case, it is not a recommended well

A method of killing a well in which the mud level in the pits is held constant while the choke size is reduced and the pump speed slowed. It is not effective, and therefore, is not recommended, because casing pressure increases to the point at which the formation fractures or casing ruptures, and control of the well is lost
The presence in a drilling fluid of any foreign material that may tend to produce detrimental properties of the drilling fluid
عمقی که در قرار داد ذکر شده و چاه بایستی تا آن عمق حفاری شود
Part of a computer system that contains manual controls
switches and devices to start, stop, measure, monitor or signal what is taking place
A method for completing a well in which tubing is set inside
A drilling fluid containing essentially clay and water; no special or expensive chemicals or conditioners are added
Something , some material which freeze or cool down other materials
عملیات راندن درون چاه جهت مغزه گیری
معمولا این اختصار برای عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
coring run, Operation's Abbreviations Companymans generally write in their daily drilling reports
All the operation necessary to recover a Core : from make up coring assembly till recover last core, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports

n: A cylindrical sample taken from a formation for geological analysis. Usually a conventional core barrel is substituted for the bit and procures a sample as it penetrates the formation. v: To obtain a formation sample for analysis
Laboratory analysis of a core sample to determine porosity, permeability, lithology, fluid content, angle of dip, geological age, and probably productivity of the formation
A tubular device, usually from 10 to 60 feet 3 to 18 meters long, run at the bottom of the drill pipe in place of a bit and used to cut a core sample
ضریب جریان یابی سیال از درون مغزه‌های حفاری
ضریب جریان یابی سیال از درون مغزه‌های حفاری
An interpretation program for complex lithology
یک نرم افزار کامپیوتری که جهت تفسیر سنگ شناسی‌های پیچیده مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
An interpretation program for complex lithologies

The process of cutting a vertical, cylindrical sample of the Formations encountered as an Oil well is drilled. The purpose of Coring is to obtain rock samples, or Cores, in such a manner that the rock retains the same properties that it had before it was removed from the Formation
COR, Operations' abbreviations which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
In piping, a metal collar with internal threads used to join two sections of threaded pipe
. in power transmission, a connection extending longitudinally between a driving shaft and a driven shaft. Most such couplings are flexible and compensate for minor misalignment of the two shafts
فشار کیسینگ یا لوله‌های جداره ای
رشته کیسینگ کوتاه با قطر زیاد که در حفاری دریایی و یا مناطق باتلاقی مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد و باعث باز نگاه داشتن دهانه چاه گشته و گل حفاری را بدرون پیت‌ها یا حوضچه‌های گل هدایت می‌نماید
COMPUTER PROCESSED LOG, Log Curve name
CASING PROFILE CALIPER LOG, Log Curve name
اختصاری دیگر جهت لغت فشرده یا کامپکت
فشار حبس شده درون لوله‌های جداره ای
COMPUTER PROCESSED TRUE VERTICAL DEPTH, Log Curve name
ابزاری که بطور موقت درون کیسینگ یا چاه قرار می‌دهند تا از عبور سیمان جلوگیری نماید
change Rams, actions or job's abbreviations which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
To barely open a valve so that it leaks just a little

slang to cave in; to fail. After a violent blowout, the force of the fluids escaping from the wellbore sometimes blows a large hole in the ground. In this case, the well is said to have cratered. Equipment craters when it falls
The workers on a drilling or workover rig, including the driller, derrickman, and rotary helpers
The driller or head well puller in charge of operations on a well servicing rig that is used to pull sucker rods or tubing
A well that has been unintentionally drilled in a direction other than vertical. It usually occurs where there is a section of alternating hard and soft strata steeply inclined from the horizontal
یک نوع ساب که در عملیات حفاری بکار می‌رود
The section of a drawworks drum grooved for angle control and in which the wire rope crosses over to start a new wrap. Also called an angle
A length of casing with one thread on the field end and a different thread in the coupling, used to make a changeover from one thread to another in a string of casing
An assembly of sheaves, mounted on beams at the tope of the derrick, over which the drilling line is reeved. See also : block
μ , also write as : crs or cr
coarse = big particles, also mostly write as : crs

A mixture of hydrocarbons that existed in the liquid phase in natural phase in natural underground reservoirs and remains liquid at atmospheric pressure after passing through surface separating facilities

Estimates of productive capacities of crude oil developed by the American Petroleum Institute Committee on Reserves and Productive Capacity represent the maximum daily rates of production which can be attained under specified conditions on March 31 of any given year

Proved reserves of crude oil as of December 31 of any given year are the estimated quantities of all liquids statistically reported as crude oil, which geological and engineering data demonstrate with reasonable certainty to be recoverable in the future from known reservoirs under existing economic and operating conditions
Xln, also rarely write as : xin
III, Archie classification of Carbonate rocks, a rock with sugary grains and loose with weak cement
کاتینگ یا کنده‌های حفاری کریستاله یا بلورین
III, Archie classification of Carbonate rocks, a rock with sugary grains and loose with weak cement
کیسینگ: یا لوله‌های جداری که پس از تکمیل هر بخش از چاه بمنظور جدا سازی سازند‌ها و فضای داخل چاه درون چاه رانده می‌شود
راندن لوله‌های جداره ای در چاه
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد

All the operation necessary for setting and cementing of Casing, Liner, tieblack from Rig Up to run casing till Rig Down casing and cementing equipment and WOC end, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
COMPENSATED SPECTRAL NATURAL GAMMA, Log Curve name
CEMENT TOP LOCATION/SCATTERED GAMMA RAY, Log Curve name

All the operation necessary for cleaning and conditioning the well for a particular operation Logging, Testing, Run Casing , etc. . Starting from making till Lay Down BHA to clean or conditition Hole prior or between operations, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
CF/D, also sometimes write as : CFD
A device made up in the drill stem and lowered into the well to allow the casing and blowout preventers to b pressure
tested. The sealing device is cup
shaped and is therefore called a cup
CCA, Actions or jobs which Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
بریدن کیسینگ یا لوله‌های جداره ای
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
control fluid that has been reduced in density or unit weight as a result of entrainment of less

ctg, The fragments of rock dislodged by the Bit and brought to the surface in the drilling Mud. Washed and dried Cuttings samples are analyzed by Geologists to obtain information about the Formations drilled
کاتینگ یا نمونه‌های کنده شده حفاری از انتهای چاه
CYBERLOOK WELLSITE COMP, Log Curve name
DENSILOG/GAMMA GAMMA WTH PE INDEX, Log Curve name
